title: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled  Study of CDN-468 (integrin inhibitor) in Patients With Hypertension
officialTitle: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled  Study of CDN-468 (integrin inhibitor) in Patients With Hypertension
description: This is a randomized double-blind, placebo-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of CDN-468 (integrin inhibitor) in patients with Hypertension. The study will enroll approximately 441 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 21-74 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Hypertension
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
